rahasyaṁ mama durlabham| ike taṅ jñāna rinahasyaṅku bhaṭārī| paramaviśeṣa ikā| mevәh tәmәntәmәn ikā| jñānānanta| ya ta kavruhanajñānānanta| ya ta kavruhanajñānānanta ya ta kavruhan saṅ paṇḍita| saṅ mahyun tumәmvaṅ kamokṣan|
santataṁ lakṣaṇaṁ viddhi| yan lanā denta kumavruhi paramarahasyaniṅ jñāna bhaṭārī|
viśate paramaṁ śreṣṭham|
padaṁ śūnyāntaniṣkalam| kinavruhanira pvekaṅ niṣkalajñāna de saṅ yogī| sira ta mantuk riṅ pada bhaṭāra śiva| lvirnya| śūnya||

yathecchā labhyate nityam| mapa ta lvir saṅ yogīn mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra| pinaṅguhnira yathecchā nityasa|
adhaś cordhvañ ca tiryañ tīryyaśtīryarś ca| nyaṅ yathecchā| ṅa| i sor i ruhur tumāmpā ya inalivatanira|
vyāpitvāt sarvakāmitvāt| mvaṅ sakahyunira tәkā|mvaṅ sakahyunira tәkā|
sūkṣmatvāt paramaśsūkṣmātiparamaś śivaḥ| ri denira sūkṣma| sira ta yogīśvara| āpan tәlas ekatva| lāvan bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

jñānañ ca sakalan tyaktam| maṅkana pva lvir saṅ tumәmuṅ niṣkalajñāna| ya ta mataṅyan tiṅgalakna ikaṅ sakalajñāna de saṅ sādhaka|
niṣkalatvan nirāmayam| kunәṅ kavruhana saṅ sādhaka| ikaṅ niṣkalajñāna juga| apan atyanta kasurudan sukhaduhkha||

bāyubhūtañ chivan nityam| ndya tāvak bhaṭāra niṣkalajñāna sira| ikaṅ bāyv avaknira| nitya ya||
jñānati paramārthavit| sira ta kavruhana saṅ paṇḍita||
niṣkalanniṣkalān tan nirāmayam| maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra riṅ bhaṭārī|\\ devy uvāca||
he kita bhaṭāra| kita viśeṣaniṅ devata kabeh| kita bapaniṅ hulun| kita makavāhanaṅ lәmbu| kita ratuniṅratuniṃturuniṃ bhuvanāṇḍa kabeh| ikaṅ jñāna vijñāna varahakna ri ṅhulun bhaṭāra||
div.ab: nihan takvanaknani ṅhulun vaneh| ndya ta humūrhūr lәvihnikaṅ arcaṇa mvaṅ mudrā| lāvan ikaṅ sarvamantra| mvaṅ kūṭamantra||
div.p:
kiṁ jñānaṅkijñānaṃ kiñ ca vijñānam| nihan takvanaknani ṅhulun vaneh| ikaṅ jñāna mvaṅ vijñāna|
svargadaṁ mokṣadan tathā| aparan tekaṅ amuhara svarga lavan kamokṣan||
praṇavasya tu māhātmyā| mapa ta viśeṣanikā saṅ hyaṅ praṇava| mataṅyan viśeṣa||
brūhibrāhmī tu lakṣaṇañ ca kiṁ| tapvan vruh ṅhulun irikā| mataṅyan varaha ṅhulun||

ahaṁ hi bhagavanbhagavān nātha|
dāsībhūtātma kevalam dasībhūtātmā kevalyaṁ| ndya ta mataṅyāt varaha kita| ya ta līṅәnku bhaṭāra bapani ṅhulun| maṅke varah ṅhulun||
kim idaṁ praṇavan tattvam|
brūhi brūhibruvi bruvi ca tattvataḥ| tapvan vruh ri tattvanikā saṅ hyaṅ praṇava ṅhulun| ya ta mataṅyan varahakna bhaṭāra|| maṅkana takvan bhaṭārī ri bhaṭāra|\\ devovāca||
div.ab: ikaṅ arcaṇa tinakvanakәnta bhaṭāri ri ṅhulun ṅūni| ya ta varahaknaṅkva ri kita| ikaṅ mudrā ya lәvih sakeṅ arcaṇa| ikaṅ mantra lәvih sakeṅ mudrā| ikaṅ kūṭamantra lәvih sakiṅ mantra kabeh| praṇava kūṭa lәvih saṅkerikā||
ikaṅ kūṭamantra kabeh| praṇava kūṭa tәmahanya| kinahanan ta ya deniṅ nāda nādānta mvaṅ vindu| yapvan maṅkana ikaṅ praṇava| yekā śarīrani ṅhulun niṣkala ikā||
div.p:
trividhaṁ praṇavan devidevī|
hrasvan dīrghaṁ plutanhrasvadīrgghaplutan tathā| ikā taṅ praṇava bhatārī| tәlu lvirnya| hrasva| dīrgha| pluta| nāhan avaknya|
bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti khyātaḥ| ya sinaṅguh tribhuvana| ṅa|
praṇavan trividhaṁ smṛtamsthṛtaṁ| ikā tāvaknikaṅ praṇava tәlu| ya ta katuturana saṅ sādhaka||

ekavindu-mahādevimahādevī|
praṇavaṁ hrasvam eva ca| ikaṅ praṇava hrasva| yekā tuṅgal vindunya|
dvivinduḥ praṇavaṁ dīrgham| ikaṅ praṇava rvā vindunya| yekā dīrgha| ṅa|
trivinduḥ praṇavaṁ plutam| ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| yekā pluta| ṅa||

ekavinduś ca utpattiḥ| ikaṅ praṇava tuṅgal vindunya| yekotpatti|
dvivinduḥ sthitir eva ca| ikaṅ praṇava rvā vindunya| yekā sthiti|
trivinduś ca pralīnakaḥpralīnake| ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| ya pralīna|
trivinduḥ praṇavaṁ smṛtam| nāhan tāvakniṅ praṇava tәlu katuturana||

brahmā hrasvan tu vijñeyam| ikaṅ praṇava hrasva brāhmā ikā|
viṣṇuḥ dīrghas tathaiva ca| ikaṅ praṇava dīrgha| viṣṇu ikā|
īśvaraḥ pluta-vijñeyaḥ| ikaṅ praṇava pluta| ya īśvara| ya ta kavruhana saṅ sādhaka||

brahmā ca prakṛtirprakṛti viddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira pradhāna|
viṣṇuḥ puruṣa eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira puruṣa|
īśvaraḥ putra eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira putra|
trividhaṁ svargamokṣadam| nāhan pagantyanikaṅ praṇava tәlu||

viṣṇūtpattirviṣṇūtpattiviṣnutpati(the cluster tn appears to have been added below a crossed-out ti, probably secunda manu) mahādevimahādevī| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira gumanti pradhāna|
īśvaraḥ puruṣaiva ca| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira puruṣa|
brahmā putras tu saṁviddhisamvidhaṁ| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sira putra|
trividhaṁ svargamokṣadamsvarggalakṣaṇaṁ| nahannihan pagantyanikaṅ praṇava tәlu||

pradhānam īśvaraṁ proktam| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira pradhāna|
brahmā puruṣa eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira puruṣa|
viṣṇuḥ putras tathaiva ca| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira putra|
etat tribhedalakṣaṇam| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira pradhāna| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sira puruṣa| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira putra| nāhan ta yāvaknikaṅ praṇava tәlu bhineda||

pūrvāhne brahmaṇotpattiḥbrāhmāṇotpatti| bhaṭāra brahmā sira sakatambe suk|
madhyāhne viṣṇur eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sirān tәṅah ṅve|
aparāhne maheśvaraḥ| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira sore|
trividhaṁ svargamokṣadamsvarggalakṣaṇaṁ| nihan pagantigantinira saṅ hyaṅ praṇava|
bhūrlokaṁ brahmaṇo viddhi| saṅ hyaṅ brāhmā sira bhūhloka|
bhuvaḥ viṣṇur iti smṛtaḥ| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira bhuvahloka|
svarlokansvarlokyan tu maheśvaraḥ| saṅ hyaṅ maheśvara sira svahloka|
trividhaṁ praṇavaṁ smṛtam| nāhan ta pāvaknikaṅ praṇava||

brahmā mūlemūlan tu he devidevī| saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira i sor|
viṣṇu madhye tathaiva ca| saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira riṅ madhya|
maheśvaras tu ūrdhvake| saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira ri tuṅtuṅ|
trividhaḥ praṇava-smṛtaḥ| nāhan tāvaknikaṅ praṇava tәlu kavruhana||

bhūrlokam ekavinduś ca| ikaṅ praṇava tuṅgal vindunya| ya bhūhloka|
bhuvaḥloka-dvivindukam| ikaṅ praṇava rvā vindunya| ya bhuvahloka|
svarloka-trīṇivinduś ca| ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| ya svahloka| ṅa|
trividhaḥ praṇava-smṛtaḥ| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅ praṇava tәlu bhinedabheda||

ikā taṅ praṇava tәlu anaku saṅ kumāra|
sakalan na tu niṣkalam| sakala ya| tan niṣkala ikā|
eka dviḥeta dvi trīṇi vindūnāṁ| ndya ta ya nihan lvirnya| ikaṅ praṇava yan ekavindunya| sakala ikāvakku yan maṅkana| yan rvā vindunya| ya sakalaniṣkalāvakku ikā|
trivinduñ ca tu niṣkalam| kunaṅ ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| yekā avakku niṣkala yan maṅkana| kavruhananta bhaṭārī||

ṣadvinduḥ niṣkalaṁ viddhi| maṅkana kitānakutikānaku saṅ kumāra| an kavruhi ikaṅ praṇava nәm vindunya| āpan ya ikāvakku niṣkala|
ekaṁ brahmā tu ṣaṇmukha| kunaṅ ikaṅ praṇava tuṅgal vindunya| brahmāvaknya|
viṣṇuḥ dviḥ tri-maheśvaraḥ| ikaṅ rvā vindunya| viṣṇv āvaknya| ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| maheśvarāvaknya|
ṣadvinduḥ niṣkalaṁ jñeyam| ya ta mataṅyan ikaṅ praṇava nәm vindunya| ya ta kavruhanantānaku saṅ kumāra| ya ta sinaṅguh niṣkalany āvak bhaṭāra paramaśiva ikā||

trayaṁ trayaṁ vā ṣadvinduḥhāsavinduḥma-vipulā| ndya ta ya lvirnya nihan| ikaṅ praṇava tәlu vindunya| yekāvak bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
brahmā viṣṇu-mahādevaḥ|
nādanādāntakan tathā| kunaṅ ikaṅ nāda mvaṅ nādānta| lāvan vindu| tripuruṣāvaknya|
jñānaśaktiḥ trayaṁ sūkṣmam| ikaṅ īśvaravindu| ya jñānaśakti| ṅa||

lg.l: brahmā viṣṇuḥ maheśvaraḥeven in lieu of odd pāda|

div.ab: ikaṅ nāda nādānta mvaṅ vindu| saṅ hyaṅ tripuruṣa māvak iriya| sira sinaṅgah rudrakālaśiva| sira sakalaniṣkalaniṣkalaniskala||
div.p:
līnalīnaṅ kriyāśaktiḥ|
vibhujñānan tathaiva ca| ikaṅ kriyāśakti| jñānaśakti| vibhūśakti| kapva līna ya|ikaṅ kriyāśakti ... kapva līna ya|ikaṅ śakti| jñānaśakti| kapālī ya
sakalan niṣkale līnam|sakalan niṣkale līnamikā taṅ sakala| ya ta līna riṅ niṣkala| sakalan niṣkale līnaṁsakalaniṣkale līnam ikaṅ sakala līna riṅ niṣkala||
viddhi viddhividdhiṁ varānane| kavruhanantānaku saṅ kumāra||kumāra||kumāra|

paramaśiva-m-ūrdhvanūrddhvān tu| bhaṭāra paramaśiva sira i ruhur|
sadāśiva-tu madhyake| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira riṅ madhya|
sadārudra-m-adhaś ceti| saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra sira riṅ sor|
trividhaṁ guṇakāraṇam| nāhan taṅ tәlu kāraṇaniṅ triguṇa||

yo jñātvā tattvavit devidevī| vruh pva saṅ tattvavit irikā|
paramaḥ sa śivaṁ brajet| sira ta mulih riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
pañcabrahmākṣaraṁ piṇḍam| kunaṅ pakәmpәlnikaṅ akṣaraniṅ pañcabrahmā|
hrasvadīrghaplutan tathā| ya ta makāvakpakāvak hrasva dīrgha pluta||

utpattisthitilīnañ ca| ikā taṅ hrasva dīrgha pluta| ya ta makāvak utpatti sthiti pralīna||
brahmākṣaram idañ jagat| ikā taṅ pañcabrahmākṣara kinәmpәl| ya matmahan oṅkāra||
saṅkṣepatassaṅkṣepakās tu he devidevī|
trividham praṇavaṁ smṛtam| saṅkṣepanikaṅ praṇava| tәlu avaknya||

sadārudram idan dīrgham| saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra sira dīrgha| ... saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira pluta|
yo vijñānati tattvataḥtatvatāḥ| saṅ vruh rikeṅ tattva|
saḥ śivaṁ paramaṁ brajet| sira ta mulih riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

śivasya paramasyāṇḍam|
nāda-m-īśāna-m-eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva siraparamaśiva| sira muṅgv iṅ nāda| īśānāvaknira||
sadāśivasya yad vijam|
vinduḥ tatpuruṣan tathā| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira muṅgv iṅ vindu| tatpuruṣāvaknira||

sadārudrasya yad vījam|
candra-m-aghora-m-eva ca| saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra sira muṅgv iṅ ardhacandra| aghorāvaknira||
bāmasadyas tu he devidevī|
strīpuṅso yugapat smṛtaḥ| ikaṅ bāmadeva mvaṅ sadya| pradhānapuruṣāvaknya| kavruhana saṅ sādhaka||

niṣkalāj jāyate nādaḥ| saṅkeṅ niṣkala mәtu taṅ nāda|
nādāt vinduḥ samudbhutaḥfor samudbhūtaḥ, m.c.samudbhūtaḥnādāt ... samudbhutaḥ| saṅkeṅ nāda mәtu taṅ vindu|
vindoḥ candrasamudbhavaḥvindo candrasamudbhavaḥ| saṅkeṅ vindu mәtu taṅ ardhacandra|
candrāt viśvaṁ samudbhutaḥfor samudbhūtaḥ, m.c.| saṅkeṅ| saṅkeṅ| ca| saṅke| saṅke candra mәtu taṅ viśva| nāhan lvir saṅ hyaṅ praṇavotpatti||

app.note: ≈ JñS 17.1c, BhS 7a: vindoś candraḥ samudbhūtaḥ; GPT 25c: bindoś candrasamudbhavaś
≈ BhS 7b: candrād viśvasamudbhavaḥ; cf. JñS 17.1d, GPT 25d: candrād viśvaḥ punaḥ punaḥ

≈ JñS 17.3: candre pralīyate viśvo vindau candraś ca lĩyate| vinduś ca lîyate nāda ity etad tattva­lakṣaṇam; GPT 27: viśvaḥ pralīyate candre candraś ca līyate bindau| binduś ca līyate nāda ity etat kramalakṣaṇam

div.ab: saṅ hyaṅ viśva līna riṅ ardhacandra| ardhacandra līna riṅ vindu| vindu līna riṅ nāda| nāda līna riṅ niṣkala| nāhan lvir iṅ pralīna ikā||
div.p:
sa eva sakalo jñeyaḥjñeya| ikaṅ deva sakala tiga sira|
śivan niṣkalam ucyateśivaniṣkalam ucyate| saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva sira niṣkala||
ṣadvinduḥ praṇavaṁ jñeyam|
niṣkalam paramañ chivam| ikaṅ vindu nәm| kavruhana yan avak bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

yo viditvā paraṁ vinduḥ| ya ta mataṅyanya mataṅyan deya saṅ prajñā| kavruhanan ta ikiṅ ṣadvindu| vruh pva sira| ya ta mataṅyan mantuk ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
idaṅ guhyaṁ mahādevimahādevī| ikā taṅ jñāna maṅkana| rahasyan de saṅ paṇḍita|
na prakāśati paṇḍitaḥ| denira rumahasyerikā| tar varahakna riṅ len|
prakāśayati yo mohāt| hana pva vvaṅ mapuṅguṅ| mehakәn saṅ hyaṅ jñāna|
narakaṁ pratipadyate| sira ta mulih mariṅ narakaloka||
div.ab: ikāna papupulniṅ akṣara pañcabrahma| ya ta makāvak hrasva dīrgha pluta| mvaṅ utpatti sthiti pralīna| liṅ bhaṭāra| riṅ bhaṭārī||

p.foreign: iti bhuvanakośan nāma śāstraṁ navamaḥ paṭalaḥ

div.head: Siddhāntaśāstra, Jñānarahasya, Paṭala 10
div.ab: Siddhāntaśāstraṁ, Jñānarahasyaṁ, Daśamaḥ Paṭalaḥ
maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra| devī uvāca||
div.p:
kenopāyena bhagavanmeyopāyena bhagavānma-vipulā|
sukhayogasya sukharyogasya lakṣaṇam| nāhan takvanani ṅhulun ri kita bhaṭāra| ndya kunaṅ upāyanikāopāyanikāeyopāyanikā saṅ paṇḍita| mataṅyan kapaṅguhāvaknikaṅ sukhādhyātmika|
prāpyate na jarāvyādhiḥjvaravyādhiḥ|
na duḥkham vāpiduḥkav vāpi yauvane| lāvan tan pamaṅguhaṅ lara| mvaṅ jaravyādhi| lāvan rūpa yovana||

prāṇaṁ tyajanti te sarvesarvvesarvva | muvah yar tәkāniṅ patinira|
sukhārthevan tadāsukhayyevan tathāsukhāryyevan tathā vibho| ndya ta deya saṅ sādhaka sira| mataṅyan tan pakāraṇaha tәkāniṅ kapatin| lāvan sukha yan sira mātya tar pāvan lara||
kim padaṁ pārameśānamparameśānaṁparameśānam|
sukhan duḥkhakṣayan tathā| mvaṅ ndya deyanira| yatanyan pamaṅguhapaṅguha pada bhaṭāra śiva| ikaṅ kasurudaniṅ sukhaduhkha||\\
{purastād īśvaraṁ sthāpyaprapyāprapya|} maṅkana liṅ bhaṭārī| devovāca||

nihan deyanira saṅ paṇḍita bhaṭārī| yan katәkān sira pәjah| +
purastād īśvaraṁ sthāpya|+ bhaṭāreśvarādhiṣṭhānanira vetan|
brahmā dakṣiṇasaṅsthitaḥ| bhaṭāra brahmā riṅ dakṣiṇa|
paścime tu mahādevaḥmahādeva| hyaṅ mahādevahyaṃ mahādevasaṃ hyaṃ mahādeva riṅ paścima|
viṣṇur uttarake tathā| hyaṅ viṣṇu riṅ uttara|
madhye śivañ ca paramam| bhaṭāra paramaśiva riṅ madhya|
iti devidevo sa yogavit| maṅkana de saṅ vruh riṅ yoga bhaṭārī|
prāṇam uddhṛtya yogenayogenā| huvus pva sira vruh devaniṅ dik mvaṅ madhya| davutnira ta huripnira| yogātahikā ataḥ kāraṇanirār davutā ya|
ūrdhvaṁūrddhvā gatvā tu pārvatipārvatī|| deyanirār davuta huripnira| piṇḍuhurakna ta ya||

app.note: = PraJñ; cf. StSt 90.3d: ūrdhvādhastāt tu pāvakaḥ

div.p:
praṇavajñānaśastreṇapraṇavajñānasāstreṇa|
chinnaprāṇa-sa yogavit| nihan deyanira saṅ vruh riṅvruh iṅ yogasandhi| ikaṅ praṇavajñāna| ya ta kāṅkәn tvәka| pamәgatanira ri huripnira||
jihvāgre tālu saṁśliṣṭam| tuṅtuṅniṅ jihvāgra| tumukupana rikaṅ laklakan|
tālusaṅśliṣṭalocanamtulyasaṅśliṣṭalocanamcf. PraJñ, StSt 90.4d| mvaṅmvaṃ ikaṅ locana| vulatakna riṅ laklakan||

kapālam bāyunodbhidya| maṅkana pva lakṣaṇānikā saṅ sādhaka| bәlah kapālanira denikaṅ bāyu| ndi ta havananira saṅ hyaṅ ātmā yan maṅkana|
śivadvāravinirgataḥśivadvāravvinirgatāḥ| mahavan ta sira riṅ śivadvāra|
prāṇaḥ tyajanti taddvāram| +
pranavañ ca vinirgataḥ|+ mahavan ta sira ṅkāna| tiniṅgalakәnira taṅ oṅkāra| vindu rovaṅira saṅ hyaṅ hurip tumiṅgalakәn ikaṅ dvāra||

app.note: = PraJñ, StSt 90.5a; cf. GPT 6c, JñS 15.4c, SHKŚ 42a (vāyu°), Vṛh 56c (vāyu°): mūrdhānaṃ bāyunodbhidya

div.p:
prāṇaḥ tyajanti yo yogī| tiniṅgalakәn pva prāṇa|
viśate paramañ chivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva| umapaomapa ta lvirnira|
vyāpī sarvagataś caiva| kapva kinahananira ikaṅ rāt kabeh| ri denyān tuṅgal lavan bhaṭāra paramaśiva sira|
sūkṣmatvāt paramañ chivam| ri denyan sūkṣma mvaṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

app.note: cf. PraJñ, StSt 90.6a: chinnaprāṇas tu yo yogī

div.p:
mokṣam evopalabhyate|
kathayāmi maheśvarimaheśvarī| hana pva tinakvanakәnta ri ṅhulun| ṅūni bhaṭārī| ya tājaraknaṅkve kita| ikā nimittaniṅ kamokṣan kapaṅguh|
prāptakālo na mokṣadam| tan ikā mokṣa| yan tan vruh i tәkāniṅ tkāniṃtkāni patinya|
śṛṇuṣvaśṛṇuś ca sahaṣaṇmukham| rәṅə̄nta varahvarahku ri kita bhaṭāri| mvaṅ saṅ kumāra||

lg.l: vṛkṣamūle śilātaleeven in lieu of odd pāda|

div.ab: ndi ta kapatyananira saṅ vruh riṅ yogasandhi| patakvanta bhaṭārī| nyan riṅ savah| riṅ halas| ri tīranikaṅtīranikaṅ vvai| riṅ guhā| riṅ gunuṅ| ri vvitnikaṅ vṛkṣa ṅkāna| mvaṅ riṅmvaṃ riṃmvaṃ ri śilātala| ṅkāna ta tiṅgalakna huripnira||

nihan vaneh kapatyananira| riṅ patapan| riṅ vana| riṅ umah| riṅ guhā| riṅ giri| riṅ nūṣa| riṅ tәgal kunaṅ| ṅkāna ta sirān tumiṅgalakәn huripnira| māti pva sira ṅkāna| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
div.p:
yatra yatrayatrā yatre mṛto vidvān| ndan deya saṅ paṇḍita sirān mātya ṅkāna| vruh ta sira yan mātya|
viśate paramañ chivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
siddhānte nāsti sandehaḥ| hayvā ta kita saṅśaya rike saṅ hyaṅ aji siddhānta|
tattve paramadurlabham| āpan mevәh tәmәn ike saṅ hyaṅ aji||

kṣetre yadi mṛto vidvān| mapa ta rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu katon de saṅ vidvān| yan mātya riṅ savah|
svamṛtyur laṅgalomukhaḥ| laṅgala mukha saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu||
jyotiḥrūpeṇa dṛśyateeven in lieu of odd pāda| ndañ jyotirūpanirār katon| katon pva rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu denira|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

girau yadi mṛto vidvān| māti pva saṅ yogī riṅ gunuṅ|
svamṛtyur gajarūpakaḥgajarūpaka| liman rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu yan maṅkana|
jyotiḥrūpeṇa dṛśyate| jyotirūpanira katon|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

vṛkṣamūle mṛto vidvānvidhvanvidhva| pәjah pva saṅ paṇḍita ri vitniṅ kayu|
svamṛtyuḥ nāgarūpakaḥ| nāga rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpeṇajyotirūpenajyotiḥrūpena dṛśyate| ndañ jyotirūpanira katon|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

śikhare mṛyate vidvān| pәpәjajah pva saṅ paṇḍita ry āgraniṅ gunuṅ|
śuddharūpeṇa dṛśyate| putih varṇa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu yan maṅkana|
svamṛtyur jyotirūpakaḥsvamṛtyu jyotirūpakaḥ| ndañ jyotirūpanirārjyotirūpanirā katon|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭārariṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

tapovane mṛto vidvān| māti pva saṅ yogī riṅ patapan riṅ alas|
svakālaḥ ṛṣirūpakaḥ| kadi ṛṣi rūpa saṅ hyaṅ kāla yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpeṇa dṛśyate| ndañ jyotirūpanirār katon| katon pva rūpa saṅ hyaṅ denira|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ririṃ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

nagare mṛyate vidvān| pәjah pva saṅ yogī riṅ nagara|
svakālaḥ vṛṣarūpakaḥ| vṛṣabharūpa saṅ hyaṅ kāla yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpeṇa dṛśyate| ndañ jyotirūpanirān katon|
viśate paramañ chivam| katon pva rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu de saṅ yogī| mantuk ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

sadārudram idaṁ jñānam| kady aṅgān saṅ yogī vruhyogī| vruh riṅ jñāna saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra|
sadāśivapadaṅ gataḥ| mulih ta sira ri pada bhaṭāra sadāśiva yan maṅkana|
sadāśivam idaṁ jñānam| yapvan bhaṭāra sadāśiva pinakajñānanirapinakajñāna sira|
paramañ ca śivaṅ gataḥ| mulih ta sira ri bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

app.note: ≈ PraJñ; cf. StSt 90.7b: sadā dharmam idaṁ jñānam
≈ PraJñ; cf. StSt 90.7d: paramaś ca tathāgataḥ

div.p:
evaṁ jñātvā tu svakālaḥsaḥ kālaḥ| nā lvirnyāvak saṅ hyaṅ kāla| kavruhana ta saṅ yogī| tәlas pva sira vruh|
mām viśate satejasaḥ| tuṅgal ṅhulun sateja| an luput riṅ pāpa|
evaṁ jñātvā svakālassakālas tu| kinavruhan pvāvak kāla sadāśiva|
mamaiko viśatemām ekav viśātemām ekav visāte tanum| tuṅgal tāku lāvan kita||

evaṁ jñātvā rahasyan tu| ike ta jñānaṅku bhaṭārī| ya ta kavruhana saṅ yogī|
na kiñcid api cintayet| denira pva vruhvru iriya| hayva manda deniṅ maṅaṅәnaṅәn| salviranikaṅ kumavruhana jñānaṅku|
strī kliva-puruṣo vāpi|
mleccho vāpi maheśvarimaheśvarī| he maheśvarī kita bhaṭārī| ikaṅ kumavruhi jñānaṅku| salviranikā| yan vadhvan| kdhi| lanaṅ| yadyapi vvaṅ tucchajanma tuvi| \arrowrightx\\
siddhāntesiddhāntan nāsti saṅśayaḥ| tātan sandehakna pva ya| mataṅyan hayva kita saṅśaya rikeṅ ajintānaku saṅ kumāra|
tantrākhya-m-evatatrākhyam eva durlabhaḥdurllabhaḥdurllābhaḥ| apan evәh ike saṅ hyaṅ aji siddhānta|\\
adhītaṁ mama sanmatamamita mama sanmataḥ| ika ta saṅ hyaṅ aji bhaṭārī| bhaṭāra paramaśivaparameśiva mājarakәn iryāku||

app.note: cf. BhK 10.10d: tattve paramadurlabhe; BhK 11.61d: tantre ’vakṣepa durlabhe (em.)

div.p:
siddhāntesiddhāntasiddhāntan nāsti sandehaḥ| maṅkana ta kita bhaṭārī| hayva kita saṅśayerikaṅ ajinta siddhānta|
tantre paramadurlabhetatre paramadurllabhaḥtatre paramadurllabham| āpan mevәh ikeṅ aji|
śivena paramena vai|
’dhyāpitātmāvyāpitātmā tu pārvati| apan ikeṅ aji viśeṣāvaknya bhaṭāra paramaśiva mājarakәn iryāku bhaṭārī||

jyotiṣan nāstijyotiṣa nāsti sandehaḥ| lāvan deya saṅ yogī| hayvayogī| hayvayogī hayva ta kita saṅśaya ri tan hananiṅ jyoti katon denira|
taṁ śivaṁ paramaṁ brajet| apan ya ulihanira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva|
jyotir vāpi na tajkajta jyotiḥ| hana tan hana ikā tejanira||
viśate paramaṁ śivam| yan maṅkana mulih ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva| denikaṅ aji siddhāntajñāna||

yadi jyotiḥ vinaśyanti vināśyanti vinaśyantīfor vinaśyati, m.c.|
tārakānte mṛto muniḥ| yapvan hilaṅ ikaṅ jyotir iṅ anakanakaniṅ mata| pәjah ikā saṅ yogī yan maṅkana|
jyotini\ mahatī jyotiḥ|
vahniś ca vimṛtovahiś ca vimṛtomahiś capi mṛto muniḥ| mogha ya sateja ikaṅ jyoti| niyata tan māti ikā saṅ yogī yan maṅkana||

eṣā kumārakākumārikā netre|
praṇavan tadanantare| yapvan tan hana tejaniṅ anakanakaniṅ netranira| hayva ta sira kahәlәtan denira maṅunyākәn koccāraṇan saṅ hyaṅ praṇava|
prāṇaḥ tyajanti taddvāramtaddvāraṁtan dvāraṁ|
dṛśyādṛśyodṛśyādṛśya varānane| hilaṅ pvaṅ prāṇa| katiṅgal ikaṅ śivadvāra denira| hanon tan tinon sira| sayojya sira lāvan bhaṭāra| mapa ta ya deya saṅ yogī|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| umulih ta sira riṅ pada bhaṭāra paramaśiva|
vyāpī sarvagataḥ param| yan maṅkana sira viśeṣa| kinahananira ikaṅ rāt kabeh||

guhāgāre mṛto vidvān| pәjah pva saṅ yogī riṅ umah| riṅ guhā kunaṅ|
svakālaḥ nararūpakaḥ| vvaṅ rūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu|
jyotirūpeṇa dṛśyate| ndañ jyotirūpanira katon saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu denira|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

jaṅgale tu mṛto vidvān| pәjah ta saṅ yogī riṅ tәgal|
svakālaḥ byomasannibhaḥsaḥ kālaḥ bhyomasannibhāaḥ kālaḥ bhyomasannibhaḥsaḥ kālaḥ bhyomasannibhāḥ| lvir ākāśarūpa saṅ hyaṅ kāla yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpeṇa dṛśyatejyotiḥrūpena dṛśyante| ndañ jyotirūpanira katon yan maṅkana|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra||

āśrame mriyate vidvān| māti pva saṅ yogi riṅ patapan masәpi|
svamṛtyu liṅgarūpakaḥ| kadi liṅgarūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpeṇajyotirūpenajyotirūpana dṛśyatedṛśyante| katon pva sira de saṅ yogī|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

raṇabhūmauraṇerūpe mṛto vidvān|
svamṛtyuḥ rudrarūpakaḥ| pәjah pva saṅ yogī riṅ papraṅan| rudrarūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu katon katatakut yan maṅkana|
jyotiḥrūpeṇa dṛṣṭo syātdṛṣṭasya dṛṣṭaśyadṛśya| ndañ jyotirūpa sirajyotirūpanirajyotirūpanirajyotirūpa sira| katon pva sira maṅkana|
viśate paramañ chivam| mulih ta sira riṅ pada riṃ padari padariṃ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

caṇḍālasya gṛhe vidvān|
prāptakāle varānane| māti pva saṅ yogī riṅri gṛhaniṅ caṇḍala|
svamṛtyu krodharūpaḥ syātkrodharūpasya| krodharūpa saṅ hyaṅ mṛtyu yan maṅkana|
jyotirūpena dṛṣṭo syātdṛṣṭasya| ndañ jyotirūpanirār katon| yan maṅkana pakatonanira|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva||

nihan tānaku saṅ kumāra|
etac caturdaśau vidvān|
daśarudrasya rūpakaḥ| nāhan ta padbәlas rūpa bhaṭāra rudra ikā|
jñātvā svakālamsaḥ kālam eva ca| yekā kavruhana saṅ yogīsa yogī| ri tәkāniṅ patinira| vruh pva sirerikā|
viśate paramaṁ śivam| mulih ta sira ri pada bhaṭāra paramaśiva||\\ maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra| sumahur bhaṭārī| liṅnira|

sadārudrasya tad rūpam|
kiṅ kālam api gīyateami tīyate| mapekā de bhaṭāra mājarakәn saṅ hyaṅ sadārudra makāvak saṅ hyaṅ kāla| mapa ta rūpanirān maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra| ndya ta byaktanira| nāhan liṅ bhaṭāri|\\ devovāca| sumahur bhaṭāra liṅnira||

sadārudram idaṅ kālam| ike saṅ hyaṅ kāla| ndya ta hetunirān pāvak bhaṭāra sadārudrarudra sarikā| vruh pva saṅ yogī ar pāvak sadārudra saṅ hyaṅ kāla|
sadāśivam idaṅ gataḥ| mulih ta saṅ yogī ri pada bhaṭāra sadāśiva sira|
sadāśivam idaṅ gatvā| kalīṅanya| avak saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva ike saṅ hyaṅ kāla||
nyan muvah| ikaṅ anakanakaniṅ mata toṅgvanira| yan mavәnәs mukhanira| mārok kunaṅ palihataniṅ palenlenanya| tan pūrṇa kunaṅ| tan pratyakṣa pratyekaniṅ panonya kunaṅ| niyata tәkāniṅ pati yan maṅkana||

evaṁ vijñāyate vidvān| nāhan ikā kavruhana de saṅ yogī|
pratijñāṁprattijñāpratijñā kurute yatiḥ| ikā ta paṅavruha| ya tekā gavayakna saṅ viku|
ātmaatma gaccha param vāpi| yan maṅkana saṅ hyaṅ ātmā byakta sira luṅhā mareṅ paramapada| nyan vaneh|
śarīrānāṁ yatefor īyate? śūnyam| niyata maṅalivati śūnyaniṅ śarīra yapvan maṅkana denirān kumavruhi| ya ta māti tan pasaṅkan lara||

mām eva viśate visatevasate devi| māti pva saṅ yogī| tan salah dunuṅ an mәgil ry aku sira yan maṅkana|
nādīnāṁ sa samudravat| ndya paḍanira riṅ vaneh| kady aṅgāniṅ vvainikaṅ lvah an patәmu lavan tasik| maṅkana ta saṅ yogī lāvan ṅhulun| nihan vaneh|
pūrva-vṛṣṭi-himanihimāni hivāni cana-vipulā|
paścāt sāgaram āpnuyāt| \arrowrightx \\
kady aṅgāniṅ megha maṅhәmū hudan| tambayaniṅ hudan tibeṅ tasik| pinaṅguhnya taṅ asin| samaṅkanamaṅkana ta saṅ yogī ry avakku bhaṭārī||

evañ caiva svadehas tu| |
śivaśaktisamanvitaḥ| umapaomapa lvirnyāvak saṅ yogī tambayan| mapalenan avakni ṅhulun tambayan| maṅkana lvirnira| kinahanan pva sira deniṅ śakti bhaṭāra|
nadīsamudrasaṅyogātnadīsamudrasaṅyogatnādīsamudrasaṅyogat| kadi lakṣaṇaniṅ vai śakeṅ lvah matәmu lāvan tasik|
paścād ekatva-māṁpaścad ekatva māṁpaścad deśatva maṁ vrajet| vәkasan tuṅgal āvaknya| iva maṅkana saṅ yogī lāvan ṅhulun||

app.note: cf. RauSS 8.10c: bhinne dehe śivo bhūtvā
≈ BhK 7.20b: śivabhaktisamanvitaḥ; cf. RauSS 8.10d: śivadharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ
≈ BhK 7.20c saritsamudrasaṁyogāt; cf. RauSS 8.13a: sakṛt samudrasaṁyogād

div.p:
śāstraṁ jñānati he devidevī| nāhan tāvaknike saṅ hyaṅ aji kavruhananta bhaṭārī|
sukhayogasya lakṣaṇam| kapaṅguhaniṅ sukha lakṣaṇanikālakṣaṇa ikā||
gopitenaiva devenadevenā| ikā ta ujar rinahasyaujarinahasya de bhaṭāra|
kathayāmi samātsamān tvayi| maṅke pva ya vinarahakәn mami ri kita lāvan śāstranya||

div.head: Jñānasiddhāntaśāstra
div.ab: Jñānasiddhāntaśāstraṁ, Ekādaśaḥ Paṭalaḥ
div.p: maṅkana liṅ bhaṭāra riṅ bhaṭārī| devī uvāca||bhaṭārī| devī uvāca|| bhaṭārī||

sakalaniṣkalajñānamsakalaniṣkalajñānaṁ sakalan niṣkalajñānaṁ|
śṛṇomi vacanaṁ tavatatha| nihan vuvusta rinәṅə̄ mami| ikaṅ jñāna sakalaniṣkala|
sādhakanihitaṁ saukhyamsādhakan nihitaṁ tubhyaṁsādhakann iti taṁ tubhyaṁ| sukhā saṅ sādhaka donya liṅta|
ihatra ca paratra ca| maṅke mvaṅ dlāha||

sakalaṁ sukham āpnoti| maṅke mamaṅgih sukha sira|
niṣkalam mokṣam āpnuyāt| riṅ niṣkala pva ya ta| pinaṅguhnira taṅ kamokṣan|
sakalan tava māṁ pṛcchyampṛsnam| ikaṅ sakala yekā takvanaknani ṅhulun ri kita bhaṭāra|
kathayasva śarīre ’smin| ya ta varahaknanta ri ṅhulun||

niṣkalañ caniṣkalaṁ ñca puraṁmuraṁ khyātam|
nirguṇaṁnirguṇyam mokṣasādhanam| ikaṅ niṣkala inajarakәn bhaṭāra ṅūni| nirguṇa liṅta| ndan ya sādhananiṅ kamokṣan|
a u ma tryakṣaraṁ nāma|
praticchedaṁ maheśvara| mvaṅ ikaṅ tryākṣara| a u māvaknya| yekā pinraticchedakәn bhaṭāra||
div.ab: ikaṅ a u ma| ya ekatvakәn bhaṭāra riṅ | 3| tuṅgal karika gavenira| siddha kari maṅkana sājñā bhaṭāra||
div.p:
akārakārya utpattiḥutpatiḥ| apan ikaṅ akārakārya| utpatti ikā|
ukāra-sthitir eva ca| ikaṅ ukāra ya sthiti|
makārañ ca pralīnañ ca| ikaṅ makāra yāvak pralīna|
ekabhāvaḥ trayībhavetekabhava tvami bhavet| yan tuṅgal kunaṅ ikaṅ tәlu| ndya ta mataṅyan tuṅgal| apan dudū kāryanya||
div.ab: nihan anuṅ pavaraha ripavarahani ṅhulun| upāyanikā saṅ sādhakasāhdaka| mahyun umaṅguhakna sukha ri huripnyahurihuripnya| apan tan byakta evәhnya| ya tikā pājarakna bhaṭāra ri ṅhulun|\\ maṅkana liṅ bhaṭārī riṅ bhaṭāra| devovāca| liṅnira||
div.p:
tryakṣaraṁ sarvadeveśamsarvvadeveṣāṁ| ikaṅ tryakṣara liṅni ṅhulun bhaṭārī| sakvehniṅ devatāvaknira|
svasukhaṁ śubhalakṣaṇam| mvaṅ avakniṅ sukha rahayuhayu|
bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ iti khyātaḥ| ya ta sinaṅguh avakniṅ tribhuvana|
a u ma kāraṇam viduḥkāraṇav vinduḥ| ikaṅ tryakṣara liṅni ṅhulun| a u māvaknya| ya ta kāraṇa saṅ sādhaka mamaṅguh ikaṅ sukha| yar vruh irikā bhaṭārī||

akārañ ca brahmasthānam| ndya ta byaktanyān pakāvak devata| ikaṅ akāra brahmatanu ikā|
ukāra-viṣṇu eva ca| ikaṅ ukāra viṣṇutanu ikā|
makāram īśvaro vindyātvindhyāt| ikaṅ makāra īśvaratanu ikā|
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate| nāhan tāvakniṅ tryakṣara| inajarakәnku ri kita bhaṭārī| ndi ta deśanya nihan||

akāran dakṣiṇe mūrtiḥ| ikaṅ akāra dakṣiṇamūrti|
ukārottaramūrtikaḥ| ikaṅ ukāra uttaramūrti|
makāramadhyamūrtikaḥ| ikaṅ makāra mūrti riṅ madhya|
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate| nāhan ta tiṅkahnikaṅ tryakṣara inajarakenku ri kita bhaṭārī|| nihan rakәtnya riṅ śarīra||

akārañakāraś ca upasthañ ca| ikaṅ upastha akāra|
ukāra-nābhim eva ca| ikaṅ ukāra nābhi|
makāram hṛdayaṁ vindyāt vindhyātvindhyat| ikaṅ makāra hati| nāhan pratyekaniṅ uṅgvanira salah siki||
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate| nā ta lvirikaṅ tryakṣara bhaṭārī||

akāraṁ mukham ākhyāntam| ikaṅ akāra ya mukha ikā|
ukāram bāmanāsikam| ikaṅ ukāra ya bāmanāsika|
makāran dakṣiṇe nāse| ikaṅ makāra ya nāsa i tәṅәṇ|
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅ tryakṣara bhaṭārī||

akāran nāsikāgrañ ca| ikaṅ akāra ya nāsikāgra|
ukāran netravāmake| ikaṅ ukāra ya netra bhaṭāra ri kivābhaṭāra kivā|
makāran dakṣiṇe netram| ikaṅ makāra yaya ta netra bhaṭāra ri tṅen|
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅ tryakṣara||

akāran dakṣiṇe śrotam| ikaṅ akāra ya taliṅa bhaṭāra ri tәṅәntṅәn|
ukāra-śrotavāmake| ikaṅ ukāra ya taliṅa bhaṭāra ri kivākivā|
makāraṁ śirasi jñeyam| ikaṅ makāra ya uttamāṅga bhaṭāra|
tryakṣarañ ca nigadyate|| nāhan ta lvirnikaṅlvir ikaṅ tryakṣara||

akāram pūrvasvarañpūrvvasvarañpūrvvasvasañ ca| ikaṅ akāra vitniṅ svara|
ukāraṁ svaramadhyamam| ikaṅ ukāra ya madhyaniṅ svara|
makārañ ca svarāntakam| ikaṅ makāra ya ta vәkasniṅ svara|
ekabhāvo pṛtak bhavet| nāhan tāvakniṅ tuṅgal mapalenan||

ukāro līyate ’kāre| ikaṅ ukāra līna riṅ akāra|
akāro līnaṁakāral līṇamakāral līṇa makāreunmetrical| ikaṅ akāra līna riṅ makāra|
makārañ candrasaṁlīnam| ikaṅ makāra līṇa riṅ ardhacandra|
candraḥ vindauvindovindoḥ pralīyate| ikaṅ ardhacandra līna riṅ vindu|
vinduḥ nāde pralīyate| ikaṅ vindu līna riṅ nāda||

nādāt samudbhutofor samudbhūto, m.c. vinduḥ| saṅkeṅ nāda mәtu taṅ vindu|
vindoḥ candrasamudbhavaḥcandraḥ samudbhavaḥ| saṅkeṅ vindu mәtu taṅ ardhacandra|
tasmāt jagatsamudbhavaḥjagatsamudbhuvaḥ| saṅkeṅ ardhacandra mәtu taṅ jagat|
sthitiḥ līnaḥ punaḥ punaḥ| nāhan taṅ utpatti sthiti pralīna mavaluyvaluy||

jagatsamudbhutaṁ candraḥ samudbhuvaḥcandraḥ samudbhavaḥfor jagatsamudbhūtaṁ, m.c. viśvam| kalīṅanikaṅ oṅkāra| ya avaknikaṅ rāt kabeh||
candre pralīyate viśvam| vәkasan ikaṅ oṅkāra līna riṅ ardhacandra|
vindauvindovindoḥ candraḥ pralīyate| ikaṅ ardhacandra līna riṅ vindu|
nāde vinduḥ pralīyate| ikaṅ vindu līna riṅ nāda|
nādaḥ līnan tu niṣkale| ikaṅ nāda līna riṅ niṣkala||

evan tat praṇavaṁ tattvam| nāhan taṅ praṇavatattva||
līnālīnamlīnal līnav varānane| līna pralīna ike bhaṭārī|
nāsikāgre tathā sthāne| muṅgv iṅ nāsikāgra kacaritanya|
vindudvayamvindudāyaṁ ihocyate| nahan avaknikaṅnādāvaknikaṁnādāvāknikaṁ vindu rvā inajarakәnku ri kita bhaṭāri||

nāsikāgrañ ca vindu-sthe| ikaṅ vindu muṅgv iṅ nāsikāgra|
paraṁbrahma prakīrtitaḥ| ya sinaṅguḥ paraṁbrahma| ṅa|
yo jñātvā tattvavit devi| ya ta kavruhana saṅ tattvavit||
sukham āpnoti nityaśaḥ| vruh pva sirerikā| sira ta mamaṅguh sukhādhyātmika lanā||

nāsikāgre tu vindūvindu dve| ikaṅ vindu rvā yomuṅguh riṅ nāsikāgra|
samparko mokṣakāraṇam| patәmunya ya kāraṇaniṅ kamokṣan||

yo vijñānati tattvena| de saṅ vruh riṅ tattvanikā|
sukhārthas sukham āpnuyāt| sukha kahyunira| sukha kapaṅguh denira|
prayogān vividhān deviprayogav vividhan deviprayogav vividhan devī| nāhan ta kvehnikaṅ prayoga bhaṭārī|
śṛṇuśṛṇa tattvāni ṣaṇmukhasanmataḥ| maṅkana ta kitānaku saṅ kumāra| rәṅə̄nta ikiṅ tattva||

tryaṅgulena prayogena| tryaṅguli yayo nitya ikā|
sukham āpnoti mānavaḥ| nyata kapaṅguh taṅ sukha denikā yan maṅkana|
aṅguṣṭhamadhyatarjinyāaṅguṣṭhamāddhyatajjirnyāṁaṅguṣṭhamāddhyatārjjinyāṁ| aṅguṣṭha| madhyama| tarjini| ikā ta paḍa yātyanta|
nāsikāruddharandhrayoḥ| ya ta tumukupanaṅ iruṅ kālih|
nāsikāgrañ ca nayane| nāsikāgra| nayana|
śrote śirasi sādhakaiḥ| śrota| śirah saṅ sādhaka||

krodhakāle prāyaścittam| aparan kālanirār pasaṅa| ri kālaniṅ krodha pih|
varayitvā mahātmanā| apa dhalanyān pasaṅa ya| māgə̄ṅ pih dhalanya|
yatnena nāsike vāme|
bahnijñānaṁ samanvitamsamanvitan| kadibyaniṅ iruṅ kivān tinukup| pamisarjana krodha dhalanya||
div.ab: saṅsiptanikaṅ bāyu riṅ pitta| maṅilaṅakәn viṣa| ikaṅ bāyu riṅ hati| sukhaduḥkha gavenya| ikaṅ bāyu riṅ manah| krodha||
saṅ hyaṅ vindudvaya| sira ta riṅ nāsikāgra| saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira susūkṣma| mvaṅ niṣkalāvaknira| kavruhana||
ri hati uṅgvan saṅ hyaṅ vindudvaya| vijil riṅ nāsikāgra| sira ta bāyubhūta| ya bhaṭāra sadāśiva| ṅa||
sira ta sukhaduhkha| saṅ hyaṅ bāyu saguṇa mvaṅ nirguṇa tattvanira| sira kavruhana saṅ sādhaka| kapaṅguh taṅkaṅ sakalaniṣkala denira||

lg.l: tat sarvam apy aśeṣataḥapy aśeṣatāḥamy aśeṣataḥ||

div.ab: ndi byaktaniṅ sukha sakala nihan| ikaṅ saptaloka sukha| ikaṅ saptapātāla sukha denira| tinәmunira taṅ sukha||

lg.l: vāno vā nāgaro vāpivānam vā nāgaram vāpivanam vā nāgaram vāpi|
dāsīṁ dāsañ ca gṛhañ cadāsī dāsaś ca gṛhaś cadāsī dāgaś ca gṛhaś cadāsi dasaś ca gṛhaś ca|

div.ab: nihan ta vaneh| sukha kapaṅguh de saṅ yati| vastrādi viṣaya| yan sira muṅgv iṅ vana| yan iṅ nāgara kunaṅ| pinaṅguhnira tataṅ śiṣya| mvaṅ dāsa dāsī| gṛha| lāvan kasiddhyan pinaṅguhnira||
nahan taṅ nihan taṅnihan ta byaktaniṅbyantaniṅ sukha vāhya hinilaṅakәnikaṅ prayoga||
hana pva saṅ paṇḍita tar vruh i tattva saṅ hyaṅ jñānaprayoga| sira ta moha deniṅ bañcana||
nāsikāgra parimāṇa saṅ hyaṅ vindu rvā sira ta bāyubhūta| nitya hana riṅ sakalaniṣkala katattvanira||

app.note: cf. BhK 9.49: idaṅ guhyam mahādevi| [...] na prakāśati paṇḍitaḥ| [...] prakāśayati yo mohāt| [...] narakaṁ pratipadyate; JñS 26.8: evaṁ jñānaṁ mahādevi| na prakāśati tattvavit| prakāśayati saṁsāre| pañcapadadhanaṁ prati||

div.ab: ikā ta saṅ hyaṅ sakalaniṣkala| līnatattva| tātan binaribari de saṅ paṇḍita||
saṅ śaivasiddhānta| tātan varahakna riṅ mūrkha hajinira| mvaṅpvaṁ ikaṅ vvaṅ tan guruśuśrūṣa||

app.note: cf. JñS 27.8d: pañcapadadhanaṁ prati (panca­pade dhanam prati D, K); BhK 6.7d: pañcapadadhanaṁ yadi (; pañcapaṇadhanaṁ yadi, ex em)

div.ab: yapvan śiṣya guruśuśrūṣa| nityabhakti| ṅkāna ta saṅ hyaṅ jñāna śaivasiddhānta varahakna de saṅ paṇḍita||
deya saṅ vicakṣaṇa| lvirikaṅ vehәn| vvaṅ tan maliṅ| vvaṅ mojar tuhu| vvaṅ bhakti riṅ hyaṅ| vvaṅ tan upahasya riṅ haji||
apa ta lvirikaṅ tan vehәn rike saṅ hyaṅ jñāna śaivasiddhānta| ikaṅ vvaṅ upahāsya ri sira| tәhәr gurunindā ya||
lvirikaṅ vvaṅ tan vehәn riṅ haji| vvaṅ maliṅ| vvaṅ mujarakәn lәñok| vvaṅ tan bhaktiṅ deva| vvaṅ upahasya ri saṅ hyaṅ aji||

vvaṅ jnәk iṅ amaṅan sarva campur| vvaṅ tan mahyun iṅ tapa| vvaṅ melik iṅ brata| vvaṅ durśīla| vvaṅ melik iṅ krama yukti||\\ nihan ta byaktanikā saṅ maṅhasyani ike saṅ hyaṅ haji śaivasiddhānta| atyantaatyantam mūrkhanya||

nihan ikā upāyanya melik iṅ haji| matakvan iṅ pūrvaka| maṅucap vāda kari kapiṅrvānya| riṅ avasāna mujarakәn tukar| ri denya nininda ri tantra saṅ deva| vetnya tan kinahanan iṅ tutur mātra|| saṅsiptanikā saṅ upahasya rike saṅ hyaṅ haji siddhānta| manīrakәn ri saṅ aṅabhyāṣa ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna||

apan ikaṅ vvaṅ yan huvus gumәgə̄ saṅ hyaṅ śaivasiddhāntaśivasiddhānta | cinalan ta ya deniṅ len| tinūtnya vuvusniṅ para cumacad saṅ hyaṅ haji| yekā parāśocaparaśoca| ṅa|| mataṅyan ikā saṅ prayatne saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| śiṣya sopacāra juga sira||

nihan byaktanirān vaneh| hana vvaṅ kinon mavastra haputih de saṅ guru| ndi ta yogyanikā nirakna vidhiniṅ svaguru| tāvat gurujñāna juga| viśeṣānugraha|| nihan pramāṇanya| sapavәkasniṅ guru tūtakәn| suprayatna ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| yan pūrvaka siddhāntajñāna ginәgə̄||

lg.l: mama guhyan tu durlabhameven in lieu of odd pada|

div.ab: saṅsiptanikā saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| paramaguhya sira| saṅ sādhaka kumavruhi sira| sira ta mukta||

lg.l: mama guhyan tu cintayetguhyam acintayetguhyan tu macintayet |

div.ab: saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| paramaguhya sira| sira ta kәmitәn bhaṭārī| abhyantaraknekaṅ bhuvana||

lg.l: cintayet rahase= rahasi m.c., or a-thematicization of rahas nityam|

div.ab: saṅ apa ta rovaṅ bhaṭārī kumәmiti saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| pamenira riṅ tribhuvana bhaṭāra||
div.p:
saṅ hyaṅ puruṣa sira svāmi| saṅ hyaṅ prakṛti sira patnī|
kṛtāntamokṣasaṅjñakaḥkṛtan tat mokṣasaṁjñakaḥkṛttan tat mokṣasaṁjña\mbox{kaḥ}|
jagatsthāvarajaṅgamaḥ| medәranta tameṅ tribhuvana saṅ kumāra||
div.ab: nāhan simpәnira saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| sakalaniṣkala kinavruhan saṅ paṇḍita||
div.p:
abhakṣyaṁbhakṣaṇaṅ kṛtvā|
sukṛtan duṣkṛtan tathā| saṅ paṇḍita nipuna ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| sira ta sarvecchā|
apeyaṁpeyite nityam|
sarvadoṣaiḥ vivarjitaḥ| sarvecchā ta sira| maṅinum ikaṅ apeyaapeyita|

lg.l: tena mokṣaiva saṁprāpyatena mokṣeṇa saṁvāpyanena mokṣeṇa saṁvāpya|

div.ab: saṅsiptanika saṅ vicakṣaṇa| sira ta umaṅguhakәn ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| apan sira tan kәna deniṅ apuṅguṅ| sira saṅ prajña juga lәvih saṅkerikā| enak māvāsa ulahulahvlahvlah deniran kumavruhīṅ atītānāgatavartamāna| nissaṅśaya sira riṅ śubhāśubhakarma||

app.note: ≈ AhS 31.34d, TĀV 15.74, NKār 48.13d, ViPur 6.7.73d, passim: sarvakilbiṣanāśanam

div.ab: mataṅyan nissaṅśaya saṅ paṇḍita| yan umabhyāsa saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| apan vәnaṅ maṅhilaṅakәn karma pāpa||
mataṅyan vәnaṅ maṅhilaṅakәn karma pāpa| apan hilaṅ ikaṅ sarvavarṇa denira|
vikalpa pveka saṅ brāhmaṇa| kṣatriya| vaiśya| śūdra| agə̄ṅ kasaṅśayanira mvaṅ vikalpanira| saṅsāra ta sira||
irikā ta saṅ brāhmaṇa| kṣatriya| vaiśya| śūdra| yayañ caturvarṇa| ṅa| sira ta saṅsāra| āpan savikalpaāpan svavikalpaāpan svavikālpa||
saṅsiptanira saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna| paramārthanira vinarahakәn bhaṭāra paramaśiva||
tattva saṅ hyaṅ tryakṣara| sira ta jagat ekatattva| ṅa| kavruhana denta saṅ kumāra||
nihan kadivyanikā saṅ aṅrәṅə̄ saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntaśāstra vinicāravijicāra| lәvih phalanira saṅka riṅ tattva kabeh| mvaṅ homārcaṇa||
mataṅyan rәṅə̄n ike saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta||

lg.l: kim punaḥ patako devipaṭake devipaṭate devī|

div.ab: mokta ikamoktika saṅ umajī saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta||
byaktanikā saṅ prayatna| humaji saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntaśāstra ikā| mlecchādi apasmārānta||
saṅsiptanikā saṅ hyaṅ haji siddhānta| kinavruhan saṅ paṇḍita| mukta sira| apan tan saṅśaya ri saṅ hyaṅ śaivasiddhāntaśāstra||

app.note: cf. BhK 10.10d: tattve paramadurlabhe (ex em); 10.19f: tatrākhyam eva durlabham
= BhK 10.10c, 10.20a; cf. 10.19e, siddhānte nāsti saṅśayaḥ (ex em.)

div.ab: saṅsiptanikāvākṣepanira saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva| paramadurlabha sira||
saṅ hyaṅ brāhmādi viśva| sira ta sakala siddhāntajñāna||
makāra sira śiva| vibhuśakti bāyu riṅ nāsikāgra||
saṅ hyaṅ atmā sira riṅ ghrāṇa tәṅәn| antarātmā sira riṅ ghrāṇa kivā| paramātmā sira riṅ nāsikāgra| nahan ta lakṣaṇa saṅ hyaṅ praṇava kinavruhan saṅ paṇḍita||
saṅyoganira saṅ hyaṅ ātmā sira uśvāsa| bāyūmәtu sake lyaṅniṅ iruṅ| pasuknya śiva||
patәmunira saṅ hyaṅ ātmā mvaṅ bhaṭāra śiva| sira ta yogatattva| ātmaśiva sirān yogatattva| ya ātmeśvarasaṅyoga| mataṅyan sarvecchā sira||
sarvecchā| ṅa| nissaṅśaya sirān gumavayakәn ikaṅ brata kabeh||
nirālambana sira riṅ brata kabeh| maṅkana ta sarvecchānira riṅ brata||
nāhan byakta saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna kavruhana||
tattva saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñāna kinavruhan| pitta paramaśivatattva siraparamaśivatattvanira| hṛdaya sadāśivatattva||
tuṅgal saṅ hyaṅ ahaṅkāra mvaṅ buddhi| buddhi līna riṅ manah| manah līna riṅ hṛdaya| hṛdaya līna riṅ pitta||
saṅ hyaṅ rudra tuṅgal mvaṅ saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu| līna sira ri saṅ hyaṅ brahmā| brahmā līna ri saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva||
ike saṅ hyaṅ tattva| sira ta kavruhana saṅ paṇḍita||
saṅsipta saṅ hyaṅ ācāra| kriyāśakti sira| saṅ hyaṅ śīla| sira jñānaśakti| vruh pva saṅ paṇḍita riṅ acāra mvaṅ śīla| sira ta tattvavit ṅaranira| sira nipuṇa ri saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntaśāstra||

app.note: = JñS 26.9d; cf. JñS 23.1b saptañ ca bhedalakṣaṇam

div.ab: tattva saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| saptākṣara sira| ya ta mataṅyan nipuṇa||

kadibyaniṅkadibyani kavicāranirān tambayan| ratu riṅ bhūḥloka sira| kapiṅrvāniṅ karәṅvānira ratu riṅ bhuvahloka sira| kapintiganirān ratu riṅ svahloka sira| kapiṅpātirān ratu riṅ mahāloka| muvah ri kapiṅlimanira ratu riṅ janaloka sira| karәṅvānirān piṅәnәm ratu riṅ tapoloka sira| kapiṅpitu ratu riṅ satyaloka| maṅkana sira saṅ rumәṅvākәn kavicāran saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntajñānaśāstra||
ratu riṅ saptaloka saṅ rumәṅə̄ kavicāran saṅ hyaṅ siddhāntaśāstra||
saṅ hyaṅ sakāra sira bhūhloka| ikāra sira bhuvaḥloka| dakāra sira svahloka| dhakāra sira mahāloka||
saṅ hyaṅ akāra sira janaloka| nakāra sira tapoloka| takāra sira satyaloka| sira ta pāvak bhaṭāra sadāśiva| pralīna sira riṅ bhaṭāra paramaśiva| ekatvaesatva pralīna ri saṅ hyaṅ anāmaya||
sira nityānanda saṅ hyaṅ anāmaya| saṅ hyaṅ pitta sira sthāna saṅ hyaṅ anāmaya||

lg.l: aṣṭāni ca guṇāni caasthānañ ca sukhāni ca|

div.ab: sira saṅ hyaṅ śivanirbāṇa| ṅa| kanirāśrayan sira||
lvir saṅ paṇḍita kumavruhi saṅ hyaṅ anāmaya| gumavayakәn ikaṅ dharma mvaṅ adharma| ya icchānira||
saṅsiptanikā saṅ paṇḍita| gavayaknanirekaṅ sākecchā| nirvikalpa sira ri sakvehnikaṅ apeyapeya| lāvan ikaṅ abhakṣabhakṣaṇa| bhakṣyanikā| tan vikalpa sira||
lāvan ikaṅ śīla rahayu| icchānirerikā||

jaṭā tattva saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇuviṣṇu tattva saṅ hyaṅ jaṭa| muṇḍī tattva saṅ hyaṅ brahmā| saṅ hyaṅ śiva śikhī tattvanira| sira ta jñānaśakti| kriyāśakti| vibhuśakti||sira ta jñānaśakti| kriyāśakti| vibhuśakti||sira ta kriyāśakti| vibhuśakti||

lg.l: ācāraṁ byaktakam idamacāra byaktatām ītaṁacāra byaktatām itaṁ|

div.ab: saṅ hyaṅ ācāra byakta tattvanira| saṅ hyaṅ śīla| sira abyakta puruṣa tattvaniratatvaniratatthanira||

nihan simpәniṅ tattva saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| praṇavabheda sira| siddha saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira| anta saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva sirasiddha saṅ hyaṅ sadāśiva sira| anta saṅ hyaṅ paramaśiva sirasaṅ hyaṅ siddhānta sadāśiva sira||
nihan vaneh| siddhaṁ hyaṅ rudra sira| antaṁ sadāśiva sira||
siddhaṁ sira kriyāśakti| antaṁ sira jñānaśakti||
siddhaṁ sira vibhuśakti| antaṁ sira prabhuśakti||
tәlu tattva saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta| sikāra sira rudra| ddhakāra sira īśvara| anta sira śiva| praṇava ekatattva sira||
saṅ hyaṅ rudra sira mūrti| īśvara sira hati| saṅ hyaṅ śiva sira śirah| nāhan ta tattva saṅ hyaṅ siddhānta riṅ śarīra saṅ sādhaka||
nyan tattvanira vaneh||
sikāra sira pṛthivī| ddhakāra sira ākāśa| anta sira svarga| tattvanirān tribhuvana ikā||
sikāra sira ghrāṇa tәṅәn| ddhakāra sira ghrāṇa kivā| anta sira nāsikāgra||
sikāra sira locana tәṅәn| ddhakāra sira locanelocana kivā| anta sira locane madhya||
ikaṅ sikāra sira taliṅetaliṅa tәṅәn| ddhakāra sira taliṅe kivā| anta sira risira riṅ madhyaniṅ taliṅa vāma dakṣiṇa||
